.. _api_guide:

API Guide
=========

.. glossary::
    :py:mod:`pydra`
        Main pydra module.

    :py:mod:`pydra.core`
        Core pydra code.

    :py:mod:`pydra.gui`
        GUI components.

    :py:mod:`pydra.modules`
            Pre-defined modules for Pydra.

    :py:mod:`pydra.utilities`
            Useful helpers.

:ref:`modindex`
